about_the_game:
Step into the fast-paced world of Super Blue Square, where simplicity meets intense arcade action! In this top-down 2D twin-stick shooter, you'll face waves of relentless enemies in a vibrant, ever-changing battlefield. As a simple shape you are to navigate through increasingly challenging levels, outmaneuvering and outgunning foes with precision.

Enemies take on various forms, each with unique attack patterns designed to keep you on edge. As you progress, you'll unlock powerful abilities that enhance your combat skills, giving you an edge in the toughest situations. With each new level, the difficulty ramps up, pushing your reflexes and strategy to the limit.

Super Blue Square offers an engaging experience with a honed in balance of challenge and progression.

name: Super Blue Square

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 960
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game will probably run fine even with Intel HD
